content.rendered:
OSM & OSGeo Mapping Party

FOSS4G-Asia isn’t just about software; it’s also about data and maps! Join us for the OSM & OSGeo Mapping Party on the morning of Thursday, 30th November. This is a free event open to everyone who loves mapping. No registration is required to join this mapping party. Come along and connect with fellow mappers! Huge thanks to TomTom & HOTOSM that organized this great event.

B2B(Business to Business) Meeting

FOSS4G and open-source GIS have become mainstream businesses throughout Asia. This B2B meeting serves as a platform where companies can share experiences in the open-source sector, showcase their technologies, seek assistance from peers, and potentially find business partners.

Date: 30th November 2023
Time: 15:30 ~ 18:00
Venue: 13th Floor, Seoul City Hall Seosomun Building 1
